AuthHeader.name: Authorization
AuthHeader.description: The string "OAuth" followed by the user’s token: OAuth ACCESS_TOKEN

metaDescription: Discover and play over 320 million music tracks. Join the world’s largest online community of artists, bands, DJs, and audio creators.
apiDescription: Discover and play over 320 million music tracks. Join the world’s largest online community of artists, bands, DJs, and audio creators.

methods.description: The OAuth2 authorization endpoint. Your app redirects a user to this endpoint, allowing them to delegate access to their account.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: The client id belonging to your application

parameters.name: redirectUri
parameters.description: The redirect uri you have configured for your application

parameters.name: responseType
parameters.description: Support only the Authorization Code Flow

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Any value included here will be appended to the redirect URI. Use this for CSRF protection.

methods.description: This endpoint accepts POST requests and is used to provision access tokens once a user has authorized your application.
Returns the authenticated user’s information.
Returns the authenticated user's activities.

parameters.name: access
parameters.description: Filters content by level of access the user (logged in or anonymous) has to the track. The result list will include only tracks with the specified access. Include all options if you'd like to see all possible tracks. See `Track#access` schema for more details.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return in the collection.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return in the collection.

methods.description: Performs a track search based on a query

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: search

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A comma separated list of track ids to filter on

parameters.name: genres
parameters.description: A comma separated list of genres

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A comma separated list of tags

parameters.name: bpm
parameters.description: Return tracks with a specified bpm[from], bpm[to]

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Return tracks within a specified duration range

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) return tracks created within the specified dates

repositoryDescription: Discover and play over 320 million music tracks. Join the world’s largest online community of artists, bands, DJs, and audio creators. SoundCloud's {language} SDK generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
